title: Computer-Supported Learning Design for Improving Argumentative Mathematical Writing Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen argumentative writing skills in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on logically structuring explanations of mathematical concepts

learning_goals: Learners can clearly articulate the process of solving mathematical problems in a structured argumentative form.
Learners can compose mathematical arguments incorporating logical reasoning with three or more levels of justification (assumptions-proofs-conclusions).
Learners can improve their argumentative writing proficiency by 20% or more based on peer assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
